titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8353

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 19 April 1862.

Hon:
Nat Gaither Jr
Sec: of State
Sir

Lieut: John McGraw is promoted_ (date of Com 9 Septr 1861) Lieut: Richard Rockingham is promoted (date of Com: 9 Septr 1861.) Lieut Wm B White has resigned (date of Com: 10 Feb 1862) Lieut: John H. Adams resigned (date of Com: 29th Novr 1861.) Lieut: Riley Wilson Promoted (date of Com: 27th Novr 1861) Benja A. Rice resigned (Com: dated 19 Nov" 1861) Major John L. Davidson killed in Battle at Shiloh (Com: dated 1 Jany. 1862) Adjt Joseph L. Frost Promoted (Com: dated 1 Jany. 1862) Lieut: A. J. Wells Promoted (Com. dated 13 Decr 1861) Lieut: John W. Higden. killed in Battle at Shiloh (Com: dated 14 Decr 1861) Lieut: Robert H. Earnest is
Promoted (Com: dated 3 Jan 1862).

I send for record &c twelve Comms: viz:
1862 Apl. 10_ Scott Robinson 2d Lieut #1
" Rob. H. Earnest 1st -- #2
" Fred: Grey 2d -- #3
" A. J. Wells Adjt #4
" Jos. L Frost Major #5
13 John R. Fisher 1st Lieut #6
" Dan B. Good 2d -- #7
" Riley Wilson 1st -- #8
" Ben F. Pumphrey 2d -- #9
12 John McGraw Capt -- #10
" Richd Rockington 1st Lieut #11
" Tho. Bates 2d -- #12

I am
Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
